name: Side by Size (itch)
description:
Side by Size is a retro puzzle game where your health plays a sizable role in getting to the exit.

Solve all 21 levels!

Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2021.

Controls:

  • Move: WASD/Arrow Keys
  • Laser: Space/Left Mouse (unlocked later)
  • Reset Level: R
  • Skip Level: Tab

Engine:  Unity

Sprite Editor:  Paint.net

SFX Maker:  bfxr.net

Music: "Ladybug Castle" by Rolemusic
